content.title: Welcome to US Medieval Roleplay Wiki!
content.text:
The age of dragons, blades, and survival begins...

Keep an eye on this UI and our website for updates, rules, and roleplay info to enhance your time on the server!

content.title: Primitive Survival
content.text: No Tek gear - swords, bows, and beasts rule the land.

content.title: Rich RP Environment
content.text: Player-run shops, emotes, medieval attire, and structures.

content.title: Fantasy Elements
content.text: Mythical creatures and role-based progression await.

content.title: Balanced PvP
content.text: Strategy and coordination matter - not just gear.

content.title: Rates & Wipes
content.text:
XP: 1.0x | Taming: 1.5x | Gathering: 1.5x

This server NEVER wipes - your journey is persistent.
